short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bypass: the chrome extension that turns your new tab into a smart dashboard with useful features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bypass is a chrome extension that enhances your new tab experience with useful features such as daily tips, weather updates, air quality indicators, QR code generator, and currency converter.
